events.message: Customer reported a car collision that occurred on April 29th involving their vehicle and a tree.
The incident has been categorized under Auto Accident based on the details provided about the vehicle collision.
An agent specializing in vehicle accident claims was assigned to assist the customer promptly and provide support.
We have officially acknowledged receipt of the customer's auto accident claim and will proceed with further steps.
Requested all relevant documents including police report, photos of vehicle damage, and witness statements for the investigation.
Customer has submitted the requested documents, including detailed images of the damaged car and official accident report.
Investigation team has begun analysis of submitted materials to assess vehicle damage and determine liability for the accident.
All investigative procedures are complete; findings confirm the collision damage and assign fault as per submitted evidence.
A preliminary settlement amount covering repair costs has been proposed and sent to the customer for review.
Customer responded positively to the settlement offer and expressed satisfaction with the clear communication provided.
The claim was formally approved after agreement on the settlement terms and verification of all necessary documentation.
Payment for the agreed settlement amount has been issued to the customerâ€™s designated account to cover vehicle repairs.
The auto accident claim is now closed following successful payment and confirmation of repair arrangements by the customer.
